content.raw: @iche033 , this pull request is trying to fix the ign-rendering release \([https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ign-rendering-debbuilder/13/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ign-rendering-debbuilder/13/)\) which is unable to find opengl. It appears the opengl is not installed. I’ll keep banging on jenkins. Let me know if you have any ideas.
content.html: @iche033 , this pull request is trying to fix the ign-rendering release (https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ign-rendering-debbuilder/13/) which is unable to find opengl. It appears the opengl is not installed. I’ll keep banging on jenkins. Let me know if you have any ideas.
